abstract.p: Cisco Systems to hire onsite philanthropy consultant to guide employees (S)

block.p: Not far away, in San Jose, executives at Cisco Systems took a step in the same direction, announcing that the company would have an on-site philanthropy consultant to guide employees.

Little wonder: Peter Hero, the president of the Community Foundation of Silicon Valley, which will hire the counselor for Cisco in the next two weeks, said 2,000 of Cisco's 19,000 employees had become millionaires through their Cisco stock.
